scripts.dev: npm run update-main:full && npm run dev-server:full
scripts.dev-full: npm run update-main:full && npm run dev-server:full
scripts.dev-network: npm run update-main:network && npm run dev-server:network
scripts.dev-setup: npm run update-main:setup && npm run dev-server:setup
scripts.dev-quick: npm run update-main:quick && npm run dev-server:quick
scripts.dev-qa: npm run update-main:qa && npm run dev-server:qa
scripts.dev-password: npm run update-main:password && npm run dev-server:password
scripts.build:win: npm run update-main:full && npm run build && npm run electron-build:full --win --config
scripts.build:win-full: npm run update-main:full && npm run build && npm run electron-build:full --win --config
scripts.build:win-network: npm run update-main:network && npm run build && npm run electron-build:network --win --config
scripts.build:win-setup: npm run update-main:setup && npm run build && npm run electron-build:setup --win --config
scripts.build:win-quick: npm run update-main:quick && npm run build && npm run electron-build:quick --win --config
scripts.build:win-qa: npm run update-main:qa && npm run build && npm run electron-build:qa --win --config
scripts.build:win-password: npm run update-main:password && npm run build && npm run electron-build:password --win --config
scripts.build:mac: npm run update-main:full && npm run build && npm run electron-build:full --mac --config
scripts.build:mac-full: npm run update-main:full && npm run build && npm run electron-build:full --mac --config
scripts.build:mac-network: npm run update-main:network && npm run build && npm run electron-build:network --mac --config
scripts.build:mac-setup: npm run update-main:setup && npm run build && npm run electron-build:setup --mac --config
scripts.build:mac-quick: npm run update-main:quick && npm run build && npm run electron-build:quick --mac --config
scripts.build:mac-qa: npm run update-main:qa && npm run build && npm run electron-build:qa --mac --config
scripts.build:mac-password: npm run update-main:password && npm run build && npm run electron-build:password --mac --config
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && npm run electron-build:qa --linux --config
scripts.update-main:full: node scripts/update-index-html.js full && npm run set-main:full
scripts.update-main:network: node scripts/update-index-html.js network && npm run set-main:network
scripts.update-main:setup: node scripts/update-index-html.js setup && npm run set-main:setup
scripts.update-main:quick: node scripts/update-index-html.js quick && npm run set-main:quick
scripts.update-main:qa: node scripts/update-index-html.js qa && npm run set-main:qa
scripts.update-main:password: node scripts/update-index-html.js password && npm run set-main:password
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
